title: Adversarial Training for Failure-Sensitive User Simulation in Mental Health Dialogue Optimization
summary: Realistic user simulation is crucial for training and evaluating task-oriented dialogue (TOD) systems, yet creating simulators that accurately replicate human behavior remains challenging. A key property of effective simulators is their ability to expose failure modes of the systems they evaluate.
